ISSUE.TITLE: Support Twitter image alt tags
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: As per https://blog.twitter.com/developer/en_us/a/2016/alt-text-support-for-twitter-cards-and-the-rest-api.html Twitter supports alt tags on their images. We should update Granary to return the alt tag for a Twitter image as well as the image itself, for better accessibility.
